architectural_elements.name: High Ceilings with Moldings
architectural_elements.description: Elegant plaster moldings now cracked and faded, their patterns obscured by dust and cobwebs.

architectural_elements.name: Tall Windows with Curtains
architectural_elements.description: Large windows draped with heavy velvet curtains, torn and faded, letting in streaks of cold moonlight.

architectural_elements.name: Wooden Wall Panels
architectural_elements.description: Dark oak paneling with carved motifs of musical instruments, worn and chipped over time.

architectural_elements.name: Marble Fireplace
architectural_elements.description: A grand fireplace with a cracked mantel and soot-stained carvings of cherubs and lyres.

architectural_elements.name: Ornate Ceiling Beams
architectural_elements.description: Carved beams overhead, some sagging, adorned with faint gold leaf designs.

furniture_and_decor.name: Grand Piano
furniture_and_decor.description: A large black piano with missing keys and a warped lid; occasionally plays a note by itself.

furniture_and_decor.name: Sheet Music Stand
furniture_and_decor.description: A rusted metal stand holding faded, torn sheets of music marked with strange symbols.

furniture_and_decor.name: Upright Harp
furniture_and_decor.description: An elegant golden harp with snapped strings that hum faintly when the player passes.

furniture_and_decor.name: String Instruments
furniture_and_decor.description: Violins, cellos, and lutes placed around the room, some with broken strings or cracked bodies.

furniture_and_decor.name: Chairs and Stools
furniture_and_decor.description: A mix of upholstered chairs and wooden stools arranged in a half circle, coated in dust.

furniture_and_decor.name: Portrait of a Musician
furniture_and_decor.description: A large oil painting above the fireplace depicting a stern composer whose eyes follow the player.

atmospheric_details.name: Floating Dust
atmospheric_details.description: Dust particles swirling in the moonlight, disturbed by the faint vibration of music.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick webs connecting instruments, chairs, and light fixtures.

atmospheric_details.name: Echoing Notes
atmospheric_details.description: Faint piano chords or violin tones playing at random intervals, source unseen.

atmospheric_details.name: Chill in the Air
atmospheric_details.description: Cold air gathers near the piano and windows, forming visible breath when approached.

atmospheric_details.name: Faint Perfume Smell
atmospheric_details.description: A lingering scent of floral perfume, growing stronger when the music starts playing on its own.

interactive_objects.name: Music Box
interactive_objects.description: A small, ornate box resting on a table that plays a haunting melody when opened.

interactive_objects.name: Conductor’s Baton
interactive_objects.description: A baton left on a podium, tied to a ghostly orchestra event or puzzle trigger.

interactive_objects.name: Sheet Music Fragment
interactive_objects.description: A torn piece of music that completes a larger composition used to unlock a hidden passage.

interactive_objects.name: Gramophone
interactive_objects.description: An antique gramophone that begins to play when approached, the record scratched and looping.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Panel
interactive_objects.description: A concealed wall panel behind the piano or painting, accessible after completing a melody puzzle.

environmental_effects.name: Phantom Orchestra
environmental_effects.description: Faint silhouettes of musicians appear briefly when certain notes are played.

environmental_effects.name: Vibrating Instruments
environmental_effects.description: Instruments that tremble or resonate in response to unseen forces or music cues.

environmental_effects.name: Shadow Movement
environmental_effects.description: Dark figures flicker across the walls, vanishing when light touches them.

environmental_effects.name: Whispered Singing
environmental_effects.description: Soft humming or singing accompanying the music, coming from empty corners of the room.

environmental_effects.name: Cold Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Sudden gusts that rustle sheet music and extinguish candles as melodies begin.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Dozens of melted candles scattered across tables and piano tops, flickering faintly.

lighting.name: Chandelier Light
lighting.description: A dusty crystal chandelier swaying above, refracting candlelight into dancing reflections.

lighting.name: Moonlight Through Windows
lighting.description: Pale light shining through cracked glass panes, illuminating instruments and dust in the air.

lighting.name: Firelight
lighting.description: Occasional glow from the fireplace, casting long shadows across the room’s instruments.
